- NEW: StepsApp now supports Apple Health;
    * You can now store your steps, distance, and burned calories directly in the Health App.
    * Your steps are nicely organized into hourly junks of data.
- NEW: In addition to steps we now also show nice charts for floors (upwards and downwards) on your iPhone 6 or newer devices;
- NEW: Share your progress with you friends, using StepsApp's new sharing functionality;
- NEW: Personalize your gender icon in your steps circle;
- NEW: Get rewarded with a cool animation, when you achieve your daily goal;
- NEW: You can now follow us on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram… directly form within StepsApp;
- NEW: Explore tips and tricks in our new support view;
- Update: We improved calories calculation. It's now based on your distance, rather than on the duration, resulting in way more accurate calories values.
- Update: StepsApp’s settings got a nice spring cleaning. Setting your daily goal and your gender are now easier and quicker than ever.
- Update: We improved the touch handling of the daily and weekly graphs
- Update: We polished the app icon… it’s now more dynamic. Nice, huh? :)
- Bug fixes

StepsApp 4.0

- Synchronize with Apple Health your activity data and analyze it in a new and beautiful way.
- Track your activity data on your iPhone and your Apple Watch. StepsApp will merge them automatically.
- Today widget, get an hourly overview of your daily steps on the widget.
- Instead of steps, automatically count your wheelchair pushes with the Apple Watch.
- Instantly share your success with your friends, right from the iMessage App.
- App Icon Badge! Display your current step count or wheelchair pushes on the “StepsApp“ icon.
- Notifications. Get notified when you have reached your daily activity goal.

iPHONE X
- StepsApp now looks gorgeous on your new iPhone X.

SYNC, SPEED & MORE
- Massive, really massive speed improvements when StepsApp is in sync with Apple Health.
- StepsApp now shows steps tracked by any device that support Apple Health.
- New notification for floors added.
- Floors are now included for export activity data.

APPLE WATCH
- Track floors on your Apple Watch Series 3. Tap on the step count to quickly switch between steps and floors.
- New Apple Watch Complications: You can now choose between ring or text style in the StepsApp settings on your iPhone.
- Enable and disabled heart rate monitoring during your Apple Watch workout in the StepsApp settings on your iPhone.
- More performance and stability improvements.
